contentItemData.label: QSG155: Using the Silicon Labs Dynamic Multiprotocol Demonstrations in GSDK v2.x
contentItemData.description: Shows how to demonstrate Dynamic Multiprotocol functionality using a Bluetooth LE smartphone app with either Zigbee-Bluetooth or RAIL-Bluetooth demo applications.

contentItemData.label: AN1042: Using the v2.x Silicon Labs Bluetooth Stack in Network Co-Processor Mode
contentItemData.description: Covers tool use, C language application development flow, and customizing the examples included in the stack.

contentItemData.label: Bluetooth Software API Reference Manual
contentItemData.description: Describes commands, events, enumerations and error codes in the Bluetooth stack and SDK.

contentItemData.label: AN1046: Bluetooth Radio Frequency Physical Layer Evaluation in Bluetooth SDK v2.x
contentItemData.description: Reviews performing radio frequency physical layer evaluation with EFR32BG SoCs and BGM modules using the Direct Test Mode protocol.

contentItemData.label: AN1246: EFR32BG SoC Bluetooth Smart Device Power Consumption Measurements
contentItemData.description: Describes how to measure the power consumption of EFR32BG devices running the Bluetooth i-Beacon example. For general instructions, see AN969: Measuring Power Consumption in Wireless Gecko Devices, available on silabs.com.
